name: sage-mvp-platform
description: SAGE MVP Platform - Tiered landscape architecture services

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd kaa-app && npm start"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../kaa-app && npm run build
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../kaa-app && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd kaa-app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:setup: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../kaa-app && npm run lint
